news: [Roadmap] MS-Access database, WAF tamper, Bruteforce of HTTP Auth, Arabic translation, Command line interface, MySQL error based injection using BIGINT and overflow
[In progress] 12% of the application translated to russian thanks to the community, GUI compatibility with Right To Left languages like Arabic

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer
[Swarm] Contact the developer for any help with Burp integration and custom development for CTF events
